page.title: 02A Day at Temple Newsam I
page.content: One day during the seven week holidays one of my friends and I went up to{Temple Newsam.}It was a very hot day. We had sandwiches and bottles of pop. We went around the{farm}to look at the animals. We found the animals very interesting. Then we went to the{flower gardens to look at the flowers. There were flowers there I'd never heard of before. There were some{peacocks}which had their wings open, which was very interesting, then in the greenhouse there was a little fish pond which had goldfish in. It was there for people to throw money in to improve things in {Temple Newsam}grounds. Then we went down to the{lakes}to have something to drink and something to eat. (continued)
